record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, FEBRUARY 5, 2007, AT 2 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:43 p.m. adjourned until Monday, February 5, 2007, at 2 p.m.
